mapper.select: select t1.id as id, t1.pub_key as pubKey, t1.pri_key as priKey, t1.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t1.km_kpg_task as kpgTask, t1.gen_time as genTime, t1.keysize as keysize, t2.name as name, t2.kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, t3.alg_name as algorithmName from keypair_standby t1 ,kpg_task t2,keypair_algorithm t3 WHERE t1.km_kpg_task = t2.name AND t1.kpg_algorithm = t3.alg_name AND t2.kpg_algorithm=t3.id
mapper.insert: insert into keypair_standby( pub_key, pri_key, kpg_algorithm, km_kpg_task, gen_time, keysize )values( #{pubKey}, #{priKey}, #{keyPairAlgorithm.algorithmName}, #{kpgTask.name}, #{genTime}, #{keysize} )
mapper.select: select count(0) from keypair_standby where kpg_algorithm=#{algorithmName}

select id, pub_key as pubKey, pri_key as priKey, kpg_algorithm as keyPairAlgorithm, km_kpg_task as kpgTask, gen_time as genTime, keysize as keysize from keypair_standby where kpg_algorithm=#{algorithmName} limit 0,1
